page.title: 13LANDSCAPE / LAW & ORDER
page.content: The fields in Hodsoll street are used for grazing,crops,woodland,wasteland and recreation.24 fields were used for grazing.8 fields were wasteland.6 fields were woodland.6 fields were crops.3 fields were used for recreation. The area around GR 635 635 is basically rural grassland.The houses are detatched in large gardens and there are several very large farms with stabling and areas of woodland. The land is generally flat but there is a steep sided valley to the East of the houses. LAW & ORDER Meopham police station is situated on the A227 at the southern end of the village.The building was built between 1950 & 90.Its a small brick building with an attached house to go with the job.
